quote: A little impatience will spoil great plans. – Chinese Proverb
fact: In a test performed by Canadian scientists, using various different styles of music, it was determined that chickens lay the most eggs when pop music was played.
joke: I had a rough day, and then somebody went and ripped the front and back pages from my dictionary. It just goes from bad to worse.
